metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13797 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The macaddress module before 0.2.9 for Node.js is prone to an arbitrary command injection flaw, due to allowing unsanitized input to an exec (rather than execFile) call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-macaddress - 0.2.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-macaddress package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.2.9-1').
